content:
QueryableDataSourceView Class

Definition

Supports the QueryableDataSource control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.

In this Article

public abstract class QueryableDataSourceView : System.Web.UI.DataSourceView, System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Inheritance
Object
System.Web.UI.DataSourceView
QueryableDataSourceView

Inherited Members

Equals(Object,Object)

ToString()

ExecuteCommand(String,IDictionary,IDictionary)
ExecuteCommand(String,IDictionary,IDictionary,DataSourceViewOperationCallback)
Insert(IDictionary,DataSourceViewOperationCallback)
Name
OnDataSourceViewChanged(EventArgs)
RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError(DataSourceCapabilities)

Constructors

QueryableDataSourceView(DataSourceControl,String,HttpContext)

Initializes a new instance of the QueryableDataSourceView class.

protected QueryableDataSourceView (System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl owner, string viewName, System.Web.HttpContext context);
owner
DataSourceControl

The data source control that the QueryableDataSourceView object is associated with.

viewName
String

The unique name for the data source view in the scope of the data source control that owns it.

context
HttpContext

The current HttpContext instance.

Fields

EventSelected

Specifies whether the event that causes the data-retrieval operation to complete has occurred.

protected static readonly object EventSelected;

EventSelecting

Specifies whether the event that occurs before a data-retrieval operation has occurred.

protected static readonly object EventSelecting;

Properties

AutoGenerateOrderByClause

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control creates a dynamic an OrderBy clause.

public bool AutoGenerateOrderByClause { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the QueryableDataSourceView object dynamically creates an OrderBy clause; otherwise, false. The default is false.

AutoGenerateWhereClause

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control creates a dynamic Where clause.

public bool AutoGenerateWhereClause { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if dynamic creation of the Where clause is supported; otherwise, false. The default is false.

AutoPage

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports paging by default.

public virtual bool AutoPage { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if paging is supported; otherwise, false. The default is true.

AutoSort

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports sorting by default.

public virtual bool AutoSort { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if sorting is supported; otherwise, false. The default is true.

CanDelete

Gets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports delete operations.

public override bool CanDelete { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if delete operations are supported; otherwise, false. The default is false.

CanInsert

Gets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports insert operations.

public override bool CanInsert { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if insert operations are supported; otherwise, false. The default is false.

CanPage

Gets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports paging.

public override bool CanPage { get; }
Value
Boolean

Always true.

CanRetrieveTotalRowCount

Gets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, and retrieving the data.

public override bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the object supports retrieving the total number of data rows; otherwise, false.

CanSort

Gets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports a sorted view of the retrieved data.

public override bool CanSort { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the object supports a sorted view of the retrieved data; otherwise, false.

CanUpdate

Gets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with the current QueryableDataSource control supports update operations.

public override bool CanUpdate { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if update operations are supported; otherwise, false.

DeleteParameters

Gets the collection that contains the parameters that are used during a delete operation.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection DeleteParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

A collection that contains the parameters that are used by the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView.Delete* method.

EntityType

Gets the type of the data object to use for CUD operations.

protected abstract Type EntityType { get; }
Value
Type

An instance of the type of the data object to use for CUD operations.

GroupBy

Gets or sets the name or names of the properties to use during the select operation for grouping data.

public virtual string GroupBy { get; set; }
Value
String

A value that is used to create the GroupBy expression.

GroupByParameters

Gets a collection of parameters whose values are used to create the GroupBy clause during the select operation.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection GroupByParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

A collection of parameters that are used to create the GroupBy clause.

InsertParameters

Gets a collection of parameters that are used during the insert operation.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection InsertParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

A collection that contains the parameters that are used during the insert operation.

IsTrackingViewState

Gets a value that indicates whether the QueryableDataSourceView object is saving changes to its view state.

protected bool IsTrackingViewState { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, false.

OrderBy

Gets or sets the name or names of the properties that are used during the select operation to sort data.

public virtual string OrderBy { get; set; }
Value
String

A value that is used to create the OrderBy clause.

OrderByParameters

Gets a collection of parameters that are used during the select operation to sort data.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection OrderByParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

The parameters that are used to create the OrderBy clause.

OrderGroupsBy

Gets or sets the names of the properties that are used during the select operation to sort grouped data.

public virtual string OrderGroupsBy { get; set; }
Value
String

A value that is used to create the OrderGroupsBy clause.

OrderGroupsByParameters

Gets a collection of parameters that are used to create the OrderGroupsBy clause.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection OrderGroupsByParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

The parameters that are used to create the OrderGroupsBy clause.

SelectNew

Gets or sets the properties and calculated values that are included in the retrieved data.

public virtual string SelectNew { get; set; }
Value
String

The values that are used to create the Select command.

SelectNewParameters

Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a data-retrieval operation.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection SelectNewParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

The parameters that are used to create the Select command.

UpdateParameters

Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an update operation.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection UpdateParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

A collection of parameters that are used during an update operation.

Where

Gets or sets a value that specifies what conditions must be true for a row to be included in the retrieved data.

public virtual string Where { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that is used to create the Where clause.

WhereParameters

Gets a collection of parameters that are used to create a Where clause.

public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection WhereParameters { get; }
Value
ParameterCollection

A collection of parameters that are used to create a Where clause.

Methods

BuildDeleteObject(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary<String,Exception>)

Creates the objects to use for the delete operation.

protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceEditData BuildDeleteObject (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,Exception> validationErrors);
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the rows to delete.

oldValues
IDictionary

The row values to evaluate in order to detect data conflicts.

validationErrors
IDictionary<String,Exception>

The list of conversion errors that are created in the data source when a CRUD operation fails.

Returns
QueryableDataSourceEditData

The objects to use for the delete operation.

BuildInsertObject(IDictionary,IDictionary<String,Exception>)

Creates the objects to use for the insert operation by using the values to insert and the error message to display if the operation fails.

protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceEditData BuildInsertObject (System.Collections.IDictionary values, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,Exception> validationErrors);
values
IDictionary

The values of the rows to insert in the data source.

validationErrors
IDictionary<String,Exception>

The list of conversion errors that are created by the system when a CRUD operation fails.

Returns
QueryableDataSourceEditData

The objects to use for the insert operation.

BuildQuery(DataSourceSelectArguments)

Creates a Select query expression by using the select arguments of the data source.

protected virtual System.Linq.IQueryable BuildQuery (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments);
arguments
DataSourceSelectArguments

Objects that are used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.

Returns
IQueryable

A list of data objects.

BuildUpdateObjects(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary<String,Exception>)

Creates the objects to use for the update operation by using the specified values.

protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceEditData BuildUpdateObjects (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary values, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,Exception> validationErrors);
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the rows to update.

values
IDictionary

The values of the rows to update in the data source.

oldValues
IDictionary

The row values to evaluate in order to detect data conflicts.

validationErrors
IDictionary<String,Exception>

The list of conversion errors that are created by the system when a CRUD operation fails.

Returns
QueryableDataSourceEditData

The objects to use for the update operation.

ClearOriginalValues()

Clears the original values.

protected void ClearOriginalValues ();

CreateQueryContext(DataSourceSelectArguments)

Creates an instance of a query context object that contains the evaluated parameter collections.

protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext CreateQueryContext (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments);
arguments
DataSourceSelectArguments

A collection of objects that are used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.

Returns
QueryContext

An instance of the context object that contains the evaluated parameter collections.

Delete(IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs a delete operation.

public int Delete (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the rows to delete.

oldValues
IDictionary

The row values to evaluate in order to detect data conflicts.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows that were deleted from the data source.

DeleteObject(Object)

Deletes a data object from a table.

protected virtual int DeleteObject (object oldEntity);
oldEntity
Object

The data object to delete.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows that were deleted from the data object.

ExecuteDelete(IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs a delete operation on data items that the QueryableDataSourceView object represents by using the specified values.

protected override int ExecuteDelete (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the rows to delete.

oldValues
IDictionary

The row values to evaluate in order to detect data conflicts.

Returns
Int32

The number of objects or rows that were deleted from the data source.

ExecuteInsert(IDictionary)

Performs an insert operation on the data items that the QueryableDataSourceView object represents by using the specified value.

protected override int ExecuteInsert (System.Collections.IDictionary values);
values
IDictionary

The values of the rows to insert in the data source.

Returns
Int32

The number of objects or rows that were inserted into the data source.

ExecutePaging(IQueryable,QueryContext)

Executes paging by using the QueryContext object from the QueryableDataSource object.

protected System.Linq.IQueryable ExecutePaging (System.Linq.IQueryable source, System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext context);
source
IQueryable

The data source to use.

context
QueryContext

The data context to use.

Returns
IQueryable

The number of pages of data in the data object.

ExecuteQuery(IQueryable,QueryContext)

Performs a query, sort, or paging operation on the stem.Linq.IQueryable`1 object.

protected virtual System.Linq.IQueryable ExecuteQuery (System.Linq.IQueryable source, System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext context);
source
IQueryable

The data source object to use.

context
QueryContext

The data context to use.

Returns
IQueryable

The data object that contains the result of the query, of sorting, or of paging.

ExecuteQueryExpressions(IQueryable,QueryContext)

Executes query expressions by using an IQueryable object and the QueryContext object.

protected System.Linq.IQueryable ExecuteQueryExpressions (System.Linq.IQueryable source, System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext context);
source
IQueryable

The data source to use.

context
QueryContext

The data context to use.

Returns
IQueryable

The data source that contains the results of the query expressions.

ExecuteSelect(DataSourceSelectArguments)

Performs a data-retrieval operation.

protected override System.Collections.IEnumerable ExecuteSelect (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments);
arguments
DataSourceSelectArguments

A collection of objects that are used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.

Returns
IEnumerable

The result of the requested operation.

ExecuteSorting(IQueryable,QueryContext)

Performs a sorting operation.

protected System.Linq.IQueryable ExecuteSorting (System.Linq.IQueryable source, System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext context);
source
IQueryable

The data source to use.

context
QueryContext

The data context to use.

Returns
IQueryable

The sorted data object.

ExecuteUpdate(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs an update operation.

protected override int ExecuteUpdate (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary values, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the rows to update.

values
IDictionary

The values of the rows to update.

oldValues
IDictionary

The row values to evaluate in order to detect data conflicts.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows that were updated in the data source.

GetOriginalValues(IDictionary)

Retrieves the original values for the specified keys that were stored during the Select operation.

protected virtual System.Collections.IDictionary GetOriginalValues (System.Collections.IDictionary keys);
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the rows to update.

Returns
IDictionary

The original values for the specified keys that were stored during the Select operation.

GetSource(QueryContext)

Gets initial IQueryable object for the data source view based on the query context.

protected abstract object GetSource (System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext context);
context
QueryContext

The data context to apply the query to.

Returns
Object

The initial IQueryable object for the data source view.

HandleValidationErrors(IDictionary<String,Exception>,DataSourceOperation)

Called by methods that perform CRUD operations when a CRUD operation fails in the data-object building process.

protected abstract void HandleValidationErrors (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,Exception> errors, System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation operation);
errors
IDictionary<String,Exception>

The type of any field-specific exception that occurred during the CRUD operations.

operation
DataSourceOperation

The data operation that caused the exception.

Insert(IDictionary)

Performs an asynchronous insert operation on the data items that the QueryableDataSourceView object represents.

public int Insert (System.Collections.IDictionary values);
values
IDictionary

The values of the rows to insert.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows that were inserted into the data source.

InsertObject(Object)

Inserts data objects into a QueryableDataSourceView object.

protected virtual int InsertObject (object newEntity);
newEntity
Object

The data object to insert.

Returns
Int32

The number of objects that were inserted into the data source view.

LoadViewState(Object)

Restores the previously saved view state for the data source view.

protected virtual void LoadViewState (object savedState);
savedState
Object

The QueryableDataSourceView control state to restore.

OnQueryCreated(QueryCreatedEventArgs)

Raises the QueryCreated event after the QueryableDataSource control has created an IQueryable object.

protected virtual void OnQueryCreated (System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs e);
e
QueryCreatedEventArgs

The event data.

OnQueryParametersChanged(Object,EventArgs)

Calls the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView.RaiseViewChanged* method.

protected void OnQueryParametersChanged (object sender, EventArgs e);
sender
Object

The source of the event.

e
EventArgs

The event data.

RaiseViewChanged()

Calls the stem.Web.UI.DataSourceView.OnDataSourceViewChanged* method.

public void RaiseViewChanged ();

SaveViewState()

Saves changes to view state for the QueryableDataSourceView object since the time that the page was posted to the server.

protected virtual object SaveViewState ();
Returns
Object

The object that contains the changes to the QueryableDataSourceView control's view state.

StoreOriginalValues(IList)

Stores the original values from the Select operation in the control's view state.

protected virtual void StoreOriginalValues (System.Collections.IList results);
results
IList

The result of the operations.

Remarks

When you derive from this class you can override this method and call the StoreOriginalValues method to determine which columns should be store for optimistic concurrency.

StoreOriginalValues(IList,Func<PropertyDescriptor,Boolean>)

Stores the original values from the select operation in the control's view state when delete or update operations are enabled.

protected void StoreOriginalValues (System.Collections.IList results, Func<System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor,bool> include);
results
IList

The result of the operation.

include
Func<PropertyDescriptor,Boolean>

The method that determines the properties to include.

TrackViewState()

Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so that they can be stored in the server control's state.

protected virtual void TrackViewState ();

Update(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs an update operation.

public int Update (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary values, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the rows to update.

values
IDictionary

The values of the rows to update.

oldValues
IDictionary

The row values to evaluate in order to detect data conflicts.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows that were updated in the data source.

UpdateObject(Object,Object)

Updates a data object.

protected virtual int UpdateObject (object oldEntity, object newEntity);
oldEntity
Object

The object to update.

newEntity
Object

The updated object.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows that were updated in the data object.

Events

QueryCreated

Occurs when a query is created.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs> QueryCreated;

Explicit Interface Implementations

IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState

When implemented by a class, gets a value that indicates whether a server control is tracking its view-state changes.

bool System.Web.UI.IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState { get; }
Returns
Boolean

true if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the QueryableDataSourceView instance is cast to an IStateManager interface.

IStateManager.LoadViewState(Object)

When implemented by a class, loads the server control's previously saved view state for the control.

void IStateManager.LoadViewState (object state);
state
Object

The state of the data source control.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the QueryableDataSourceView instance is cast to an IStateManager interface.

IStateManager.SaveViewState()

When implemented by a class, saves the changes to a server control's view state to an object.

object IStateManager.SaveViewState ();
Returns
Object

The object that contains the changes to the server control's view state.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the QueryableDataSourceView instance is cast to an IStateManager interface.

IStateManager.TrackViewState()

When implemented by a class, gets a value that indicates whether a server control is tracking its view-state changes.

void IStateManager.TrackViewState ();

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the QueryableDataSourceView instance is cast to an IStateManager interface.
